name: platformer (noah harpin)
description:
Gameplay:
You play as a 'tarnished' exploring the open world with wasd movement controls and mouse to look around or use a controller. In the world you will find coins and powerups such as jump boost and speedboost. Late in the game you can use coins to buy a key used for opening the final room. The level includes moving platforms and checkpoints for enhanced gameplay.

Minimum Specifications:
750mb of storage
8GB RAM
4GB VRAM
